transcript:
Customer: Ye to sach hai ke bhagwan hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello good morning Vikas ji Abhishek baat kar raha hu India Mart se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji sir aap koi ticket jo cancellation aapke regarding maine connect kiya hua hai.
Executive: To kya aapne try bhi ho sakta hai kya ho kya aap ek bar check kar sakte hain jaise jis internet se internet connection se aap ek bar
Customer: Same issue hai sir wo nahi chal raha wo.
Executive: Other internet connection se bhi same issue hai.
Customer: Ha?
Executive: Other matlab like jaise for example aap Airtel ka sim use kar rahe hain Airtel ka connection use kar rahe hain.
Executive: To other koi connection other sim ka other internet ka.
Customer: Other se bhi kar liya sir wifi se dekha tha connect karke wo bhi nahi chal raha.
Executive: Wo bhi nahi chal raha hai.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai to team me is baat ka update manga to main isko update kar raha tha. Kyunki issue solve karne ke liye confirm karke hi solve hoga. Right sir?
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai. Thank you so much.
Executive: Main aapko batata hu update ke liye. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's internet is not working.

Resolution:

- Executive is taking an update on the issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will provide an update to the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- internet, cancellation, ticket, update
